scripts.dev: bash -lc 'if [ ! -x .venv/bin/python ]; then echo "[api] .venv가 없습니다. cd apps/api && python3 -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -e ."; exit 1; fi; if ! .venv/bin/python -c "import uvicorn" >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo "[api] uvicorn 미설치 상태입니다. source .venv/bin/activate && pip install -e . 를 실행하세요."; exit 1; fi; .venv/bin/python -m uvicorn app.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000'
scripts.test: bash -lc 'PY=.venv/bin/python; if [ ! -x "$PY" ]; then PY=python3; fi; $PY -m compileall -q app && if $PY -m pytest --version >/dev/null 2>&1; then $PY -m pytest -q; else $PY -m unittest discover -s tests -p "test_*.py"; fi'
scripts.quality:report: bash -lc 'PY=.venv/bin/python; if [ ! -x "$PY" ]; then PY=python3; fi; PYTHONPATH=. $PY -m tests.quality_eval_report'
